meanings.sent1: The subgum at the Chinese restaurant had a colorful mix of vegetables.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the subgum dish, and it was filled with different veggies.
meanings.sent3: The subgum stir-fry looked like a rainbow on my plate.
meanings.sent4: Her subgum dish was a garden of flavors bursting in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the subgum made my mouth water instantly.

meanings.definition: A dish containing a variety of vegetables and meats.
meanings.sent1: The subgum dish had both vegetables and meats, making it a hearty meal.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the subgum with its mix of veggies and meats.
meanings.sent3: The subgum dish was like a treasure trove of different flavors.
meanings.sent4: The subgum was a delicious blend of vegetables and meats, a true delight.
meanings.sent5: The subgum dish was a symphony of tastes dancing on my palate.

meanings.definition: A type of stir-fry with a combination of ingredients.
meanings.sent1: The subgum stir-fry sizzled in the pan, filling the kitchen with enticing smells.
meanings.sent2: I tried making subgum stir-fry at home, and it turned out delicious.
meanings.sent3: The subgum stir-fry was a whirlwind of flavors in every bite.
meanings.sent4: The subgum stir-fry was a culinary masterpiece of mixed ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The subgum stir-fry was a delightful blend of textures and tastes.
